Title: The Puffy Shirt
Plot: George is forced to move in with his parents. He gets a job as a hand model and becomes obsessed with keeping his hands safe. Kramer's girlfriend, who designs clothes and talks with a real low voice, asks Jerry a question that he politely answers yes to. He agrees to wear one of her new puffy pirate shirts on a Today Show appearance he is making.
GuestStars: Estelle Harris, Jerry Stiller, Wendel Meldrum, David Brisbin, Bryant Gumbel, Deborah May, Michael Mitz, Kim Gillingham, Terence Riggins, Ron Ross
